page.description: Get the control from a position - if position is ommitted, use mouse cursor position.
page.syntax: Control_Definition as C = UI_DLG_CONTROL_FROM_POS(C dialog_name[,N x[,N y]])

argument.name: dialog_name
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

argument.name: x
argument.description: Optional. The horizontal coordinate of the dialog box.

argument.name: y
argument.description: Optional. The vertical coordinate of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_CONTROL_FROM_POS() function returns the definition of the control that the mouse is over.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example tells you where the mouse is by reporting the definition of the control it is over.
